00065 void shot::update()
00066 {
00067     life_counter++;
00068 
00069     rect.x=x-(rect.w/2);
00070     rect.y=y-(rect.h/2);
00071 
00072     void * self=this;
00073     controller * ctrl = rect_collide_all(rect,this,0);
00074     if (!ctrl==NULL)
00075     {
00076         if (ctrl->id_type=="astroid")
00077         {
00078             ctrl->delete_this=true;
00079             delete_this=true;
00080         }
00081     }
00082 
00083     physics();
00084     gm_engine->blit(x,y,sprite,0);
00085 //std::cout << rect.x << " " << rect.y << " ; " << rect.w << " " << rect.h << "\n";
00086     if (life_counter > 45)
00087         delete_this=true;
00088 }

00090 void shot::physics()
00091 {
00092 
00093     if (x > play_area::scale_width)
00094        x=0;
00095     if (y > play_area::scale_height)
00096        y=0;
00097 
00098     if (x < 0)
00099         x=play_area::scale_width;
00100     if (y < 0)
00101         y=play_area::scale_height;
00102 
00103     x=x+(cos(direction*3.14/180)*speed);
00104     y=y-(sin(direction*3.14/180)*speed);
00105 }
